name: Sunil Perera
description: '''Uswatta Liyanage Ivor Sylvester Sunil Perera''' ([[Sinhala language|Sinhala]]: සුනිල් පෙරේරා; 14 September 1952 – 6 September 2021) was a Sri Lankan vocalist, guitarist, songwriter and composer. Described as one of the most influential musicians in Sri Lankan music history, Perera was the leader and the lead vocalist of [[The Gypsies (Sri Lankan band)|The Gypsies]]. He was associated with Sri Lanka's [[baila (genre)|baila]] genre, and gained the nickname "Baila Chakravarthy".
